<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dance Underfoot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4467) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Step Lively](/Feats.aspx?ID=4466)

</column>

---

You dart under the legs of your enemies in combat. You can end a successful [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) action in a Large or larger enemy's space. Also, when using the [Step Lively](/Feats.aspx?ID=1432) feat, you can [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87) into the triggering enemy's space. The enemy must have limbs or otherwise leave you enough room for this maneuver, as determined by the GM. For instance, you could share space with a giant or dragon, but not an ooze.

<title level="2">Dance Underfoot leads to...</title>
[Toppling Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4472)
name: Dance Underfoot
